document.full_text: shelvin mack epitomizes why butler should not be considered any kind of cuddly underdog. the 6-foot-3, 215-pound mack is butler's answer to the transcendent connecticut star kemba walker.
document.title: an underdog with a top-dog attitude
lines_and_colors: shelvin mack epitomizes why butler should not be considered any kind of cuddly underdog. the 6-foot-3, 215-pound mack is butler's answer to the transcendent connecticut star kemba walker.
